meanings.definition: To sketch again or make a new sketch of something.
meanings.sent1: She decided to resketch her drawing to make it better.
meanings.sent2: Artists often resketch their ideas to improve their work.
meanings.sent3: After erasing the mistake, she had to resketch the entire portrait.
meanings.sent4: The architect had to resketch the building plans due to new regulations.
meanings.sent5: He resketched the landscape with vibrant colors, bringing it to life.
